query-users.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role ENUM(%s) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'PLAYER', score INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, lives INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 3, played_games INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, wins INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, losses INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, kick_count INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, kick_reason VARCHAR(250), PRIMARY KEY (id));

query-words.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS words (id INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, word VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY (id));
